short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sorts the search results on https://www.sec.gov/edgar/search/

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enables a sort on the search results on the full text search website by SEC Edgar. By default, on page load, the search results will be sorted by the "Reporting For" date.

Note: Current version requires that the entire page be refreshed for the highlight feature to work.
